: : Kup : : 
Kup looks out and sees the rusty haze for himself. 
Kup: Oh slag! Of all the damn things to happen... 
Kup slams his fist into a near by computer terminal, putting the ship on red alert. The alarms sound as the ship seals off, and the deflector shields activate. 
He then opens a comm to every Maximal in the base. 
Kup: This is security chief Kup. We have reason to believe that a very infections and lethal plague is airborn and heading this way. If you are infected you will not notice symptoms at first, but will later encounter small glitches, and eventually decay of rust. Do not leave the base untill informed otherwise. 
Kup runs for the Commanders office. 
Kup: Come with me Aerotaur. I guess the attack on the Predacons that Katya and I were planning will be delayed even more. 
He reaches the office and finds only Yggdrasil inside. 
Kup: Commander, I'm sure you heard my report over the comm. I'm not sure what to do. And where is Rodimus Prime? 
 Rudra656@... wrote: ::Aerotaur:: 
      He nods and dashes to the nearest hatch but he pauses there looking at the sky.  He sees the rusty haze approaching from the direction the pod had been in.  Backpedaling he closes the door and turns back to Kup.  "Sir, unless I'm mistaken, the pod has found us."
